The purpose of the assignment is to choose one of the New York Times APIs, construct an interface in R to read in the JSON data, and
transform it into an R DataFrame.

## Load Package

```{r package message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
```

## Pulling the API
```{r}

api_url <- ("https://api.nytimes.com/svc/books/v3/lists/overview.json?api-key=cDBAu9OXHrsoKc2KmVV55xQcpC2J7uHO")

api_json <- fromJSON(api_url)

api_json
```
